4: p strong selects all strong elements that are inside of any p
#fancy span selects any span elements that are inside of the element with id="fancy"
5: #cool span selects all <tag>span</tag> elements that are inside of elements with id="cool"
7: #big.wide selects all elements with id="big" that also have class="wide"
9: p, .fun selects all p elements as well as all elements with class="fun"
a, p, div selects all a, p and div elements
10: p * selects any element inside all p elements.
